title: Buggy patch 6.14
body:
what going on?! 

I just bugged out of 3 different queues and now have to wait for the queue. please get this fixed.
 am i the only one having problems?

replies.body:
I'm having similar issues where it will crash either as I attempt to load into a game or right after I get into Summoner's Rift.  

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/0mTVnJ0s-614-patch-bugsplat-issues

Caeden, it sounds like there may be a software or hardware issue causing your game to render imporperly.  It could be a graphics driver update issue, or the patcher may corrupt files.  There are some additional steps that can be taken, made available in our [Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide.  If these troubleshoot steps do not resolve the issue, please contact our tech team by submitting a [player support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
Thanks for getting back to us Porocles.  Will try some of these fixes.

Are you receiving any error messages?  Your specific sounds like your connection is being blocked or strained from reaching the game server.  Go over our [Troubleshoot Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for some steps towards resolving this.
